name: The Mandela Catalogue - Fan Game
description:
This is a very short story-based fan-game based on The Mandela Catalogue, an analog horror series by Alex Kister on YouTube.

This is my first game in Unity and I decided to share it with you guys!

Check out my YouTube and Twitch!

Known Bugs:

  • Escape Key won't release mouse in some cutscenes
  • Movement is buggy if keys are spammed
